name: prompt-cop
description: A lightweight security tool to detect potential prompt injection vulnerabilities in code files

scripts.security:self-check: node cli.js . --exclude node_modules .git coverage scanner.test.js scanner.js cli.js jest.config.js simple.test.js README.md --severity medium
scripts.security:self-check-json: node cli.js . --exclude node_modules .git coverage scanner.test.js scanner.js cli.js jest.config.js simple.test.js README.md --severity medium --json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run security:self-check

author: pavanvamsi3
